class.name: DojoTy
class.description: Represents a type in the Dojo ecosystem. This class is the base for more specific types like [DojoStruct], [DojoEnum], and [DojoPrimitive]. It provides a common interface for handling different kinds of types used in Dojo contracts.

method.name: get_value
method.description: Returns the value of the type. This can be a [DojoPrimitive], [DojoStruct], [DojoEnum], or another [DojoTy] for complex types.

method.name: set_value
method.description: Sets the value of the type.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the type.

method.name: set_name
method.description: Sets the name of the type.
